name: IpTNLPReducer
brief:
Wrapper to solve subproblems with fewer constraints

TNLPReducer wraps an existing TNLP and presents a reduced problem
with specified constraints, lower bounds, and upper bounds removed.
Useful for experimentation with constraint subsets.

Can skip:
- Constraints (by index)
- Lower bounds on variables
- Upper bounds on variables
- Fix certain variables

@note Not efficient - still evaluates full problem internally.
Primarily for debugging and experimentation.
